name: Cyber Mad
description:
Cyber Mad is a 3D, low poly, endless, action game that try to provide feelings of chase scenes of Hollywood films in Sci-Fi world.  Huge inspiration from "My Friend Pedro".

Developed as a BUG Fall 2019 project by Gökhan Yahya TORBA.

HOW TO PLAY

___________________________________________

W / UpArrow ----------- Move Left
S / DownArrow --------- MoveRight
Right Click (Hold) ---- Look Forward
Left Shift ------------ Slow Motion
Ctrl + H -------------- Close stat windows
___________________________________________

Enjoy :D
